name: thr_high_ib_mpi
description: MPI IB speed (recv OR xmit) > 5 * 10 ** 8 B/s

name: thr_low_ib_mpi
description: MPI IB speed (recv AND xmit)  < 1.0 * 10 ** 6 B/s

name: thr_high_ib_fs
description: FS IB speed (recv OR xmit)  > 5 * 10 ** 8 B/s

name: thr_low_ib_fs
description: FS IB speed (recv AND xmit)  < 1.0 * 10 ** 6 B/s

name: thr_high_ib
description: High MPI and FS IB speed (MPI IB speed (recv OR xmit) > 5 * 10 ** 8 B/s AND FS IB speed (recv OR xmit)  > 5 * 10 ** 8 B/s)

name: thr_low_ib
description: Low MPI and FS IB speed (MPI IB speed (recv AND xmit)  < 1.0 * 10 ** 6 B/s AND FS IB speed (recv AND xmit)  < 1.0 * 10 ** 6 B/s)
